intro: Fissistigma obtusifolium, commonly known as the broad-leaved fissistigma, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. Fissistigma obtusifolium is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
